required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Optimal Value Increase of Egg Products
clinical_study.official_title: OPTIEgg- Optimal Value Increase of Egg Products

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this project is to evaluate daily intake of eggshell membrane taken as supplement (capsule), will reduce markers of inflammation in older people.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: This study is a randomized double-blinded controlled trial and is considered as a pilot study.
study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)
study_design_info.masking_description: One of the employees will distribute the capsules and know which of the group is placebo and intervention. Everyone else involved in the project will be blinded for this knowledge.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in plasma levels of inflammatory markers
primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and after 4 weeks (end of study)

primary_outcome.measure: Change in plasma levels of inflammatory markers
primary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and after 4 weeks (end of study)

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in body composition - measured by Bioimpedance (BIA)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and after 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: fat free mass (% and kg), fatt mass (% and in kg)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and after 4 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in markers related to lipid metabolism
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and after 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Blood concentrations of e.g. triglycerides, total-, LDL- and HDL- cholesterol, free fatty acids and lipoprotein subclasses

secondary_outcome.measure: Peripheral blood mononuclear cell (PBMC) gene expression
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and after 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: mRNA levels of of genes involved in lipid metabolism and inflammation

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and after 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Consenctration of faecal short-chain fatty acids

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and after 4 weeks
Measured at baseline and after 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: e.g. concentration of serum ghrelin, amylin, leptin

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and after 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: concentration of amino acids in blood

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and after 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: concentration of low molecular molecules in blood

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and after 4 weeks
Measured at baseline and after 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Measured as body weight in kg/height in meter2 ( kg/m2)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Measured at baseline and after 4 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Short Physical Performance Battery (SPPB) test (includes balance test, chair test (sit to stand) and walk test)

arm_group.description: Participants will consume 2 capsules containing eggshell membrane(ESM) with breakfast every day in 4 weeks.
Participants will consume 2 capsules with no bioactive substance (placebo) with breakfast every day in 4 weeks.

intervention.description: The intervention group will consume two capsules containing (in total) 500mg ESM with breakfast every day in 4 weeks.
The placebo group will consume two placebo capsules (Cellulose) with breakfast every day in 4 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
The study will include home-dwelling men and women ≥ 70 years. All subjects have to be in a good enough condition to meet up at the Department of Nutrition, University of Oslo at two occasions during the study period.
Exclusion Criteria:
- CRP >10 mg/L
- Egg allergy
- Use of medication affecting inflammation
- Unstable use of medication or supplements last 3 months
- Unwilling to keep the physical activity level, habitual dietary intake, tobacco use and weight stable during the study period
- Severe illness last 3 months
- Unwilling to perform physical tests
- Eligibility
- Diabetes type I or II, HbA1c ≥ 6.5 %
